Html:
Good day everyone.

I'm developing an application that has to run a macro from php, the macro is in the same pc as the application will be. Is it possible to do that with this class?

 

I was sent to this site from another forum so I'm new with this class, that's why I'm asking you guys first

At the moment, the answer is "No". PHPExcel doesn't support Excel macros, and I'm not aware of any PHP Excel reader that can handle this. The only option that I know would work is PHP's COM interface to Excel itself.
